main event: A round or spherical object, approximately 25-30 feet in diameter and emitting a bright red glow, was observed hovering over Rhein-Main Air Base in Germany for 10-15 minutes before suddenly accelerating to a high speed and disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed by several individuals in the immediate vicinity of the air base.
The object hovered or remained stationary for approximately 10-15 minutes.
The object suddenly accelerated to a very high speed and disappeared from sight.
No noise or exhaust was observed during the sighting.
The behavior and appearance of the object did not conform to any known aircraft or meteorological phenomena.
sighted object: a round or spherical object, approximately 25-30 feet in diameter, emitting a bright red glow
witnesses: several individuals in the immediate vicinity of the air base
